resources.string: Kripya kuch bhi aapattijanak ya apmaanjanak na kahein
Account detail match nahin kar rahe hain
Niche diye sabhi account verified mobile number ka upayog kar rahe hain. Kripya us account ke niche diye suchi se chunein jise aap punha restore karna chahte hain.
Is vigyapan me koi dilchspi nahi hai.
mujhe yah vigyapan kyon dikhai de raha hai?
• Sharechat par aapke davara kiye gae interaction aur partner se mili jankaari ke aadhar par aapko vigyapan dikhae jate hai.
• Jab aapki pasand aur jankaari vigyapandata ke anurohdon se mail khati hai, tab ham aapko vigyapan dikhakar aapke liye sabse prasangik vigyapan anubhav banane ki kosish krate hai.

"aap is group ke maalik hain.
2 sharechat par message kar ya whatsapp aur any application par group ki link bhej kar aap sadasyo ko aamantrit kar sakte hain
3. maalik ki shaktiyan • maalik ke paas admin ki shabhi shaktiyan hain • maalik any admin ko jod ya hata sakta hai
4 Admin ke pas kya shaktiyan hain ? • Admin aur bhi admin ko jod sakta hai par any admin ko hata nahi sakyta hai • trending ya mukhy feed me daalne ke lie admin post ka chayan kar sakta hai. sirf admin ko pending post ki ek feed dikhayi degi jahan par post ko trending feed me daalne ke lie admin dwara anumati milegi. • Top creator banane ya top creator se hataane ka chayan admin dwara kiya jayega
5 top creator banne ke kya faayde hain? Admin ya top creator ke dwara ki gayi post apne aap sweekrit hokar group ki trending feed me dikhaayi degi."
"%s ke group %s se abhi ShareChat par judiye %s"
Apne Group me dikhaane ke lie is post ko manjoor karen.
Group safaltapurwak update ho gaya hai

Note: FAQ me niyamit roop se naye version ko update kiya jata hai. Hum app ki samasyaon ko lagatar suljhane wa use aur behtar banane ka prayas kar rahe hain. To kripya playstore me jayein aur sunishchit karein ki aapne ShareChat app ka naya version update kiya hai.
